message.original: 氷属性の複数の魔矢を一点に集中して放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で魔矢の本数増加（４→６）</COL>
message.translation: Fire multiple magickal arrows with the Ice attribute at a single point. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases magickal arrows fired (4→6).</COL>

message.original: 魔矢を放ち、着弾地点に体力回復効果のある 魔法球を展開する（対不死には攻撃） 味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復力上昇／展開エリア拡張 LV.６でターゲット数増加（２→４）</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of health restoration at the impact point. (Inflicts damage to undead) The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases healing power. Increases size of the effect. LV.6: Increases number of targets (2→4).</COL>

message.original: 魔矢を放ち、着弾地点に一部の状態異常回復効果 のある魔法球を展開する（対不死には攻撃） 味方に接触させれば魔法球が吸着する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費減少 LV.６でターゲット数増加（１→２）</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of debilitation recovery at the impact point. (Inflicts damage to undead) The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Reduces Stamina cost. LV.6: Increases number of targets (1→2).</COL>

message.original: 起爆性のある魔矢を放つ 敵に刺さった魔矢への攻撃には爆発がともなう 爆発に接触した周囲の敵は中心地に吹き飛ぶ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で爆発範囲が拡張</COL>
message.translation: Loose a magickal arrow that attaches to enemies. Upon attacking the magickal arrow, it will trigger an explosion. Enemies in contact with the explosion will be knocked away. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the range of the explosions.</COL>

message.original: 聖属性の魔矢を放ち、着弾場所に魔法球を 展開する。敵に接触させた場合魔法球が付着し 継続して体力を奪う <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で魔法球継続時間が延長／攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows of the Holy attribute. The arrows will emit a magickal sphere upon impact. Enemies in contact with the sphere will continously take damage. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases duration of spheres. Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 敵の物理攻撃力と魔法攻撃力を 一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化 LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that decrease the Physical and Magickal attack power of enemies for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation. LV.6: Increases number of targets (3→5).</COL>

message.original: 敵の物理防御力と魔法防御力を 一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化 LV.６でターゲット数増加（３→５）</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that decrease the Physical and Magickal defense of enemies for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation. LV.6: Increases number of targets (3→5).</COL>

message.original: 壁に反射し、敵を追従する雷属性の魔矢を放つ 反射させる度に威力が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で反射回数が増加</COL>
message.translation: Loose a magickal arrow that increases in power as it ricochets towards its target. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage. LV.6: Increases the number of ricochets.</COL>

message.original: 魔矢を放ち、着弾地点にスタミナ回復効果のある 魔法球を展開する。味方に接触させれば魔法球が 吸着する（対不死には攻撃） <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔法球継続時間の延長／展開エリア拡張 LV.６で魔力増加速度の上昇</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that emit an area of Stamina restoration at the impact point. (Inflicts damage to undead) The field will attach to an ally if the arrow makes contact. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration. Increases size of the effect. LV.6: Increases casting speed.</COL>

message.original: 敵の耐久力を一定時間低下させる魔矢を放つ <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化 LV.６で魔力増加速度の上昇／ ターゲット数増加（５→７）</COL>
message.translation: Fire magickal arrows that decrease the Endurance of enemies for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the rate of debilitation accumulation. LV.6: Increases casting speed. Increases number of targets (5→7).</COL>

message.original: 怒り中の敵のシークレットコアにのみ有効な魔矢 攻撃を加えることで敵スタミナを大幅に低下させる 魔法球を展開する。コアは構え中に発見可能 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に低下力の強化 LV.６で魔法球継続時間が延長</COL>
message.translation: Loose a magickal arrow that attaches to revealed weakpoints of enemies and forms a sphere. Greatly decreases the Stamina of enemies when attacked. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the stamina reduction. LV.6: Increases the duration of the sphere.</COL>

message.original: 魔力を十分に溜めた後、特大威力の聖属性魔矢を放つ <PADM>左スティック<KEYM>移動キー</KEYM>で軌道操作可能。威力はスタミナ依存 なお当たった部位は暫く自動的に魔矢の標的になる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力／魔力増加速度の上昇 LV.６で攻撃ヒット数増加</COL>
message.translation: After gathering sufficient magickal power, let loose an extraordinarily powerful Holy arrow. The arrow can be controlled mid-flight with the <PADM>Left Stick<KEYM>Movement Keys</KEYM>. The power of the skill depends on the max stamina available. The spot that is hit will automatically be targeted by magickal arrows for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage and cast speed of the skill. LV.6: Increases number of hits.</COL>

message.original: 癒しの力を込めた魔矢を放ち、上空で起爆させる 矢は起爆時に強い光を放ち、照らされた味方の 体力を一定量回復する（対不死には攻撃） <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復量上昇 LV.６で起爆時の閃光効果強化</COL>
message.translation: Let loose a holy magickal arrow imbued with the power to heal into the sky and detonate it. The arrow emits a strong flash at the time of detonation, and those within it's light recover a portion of health.(Damages Undead) <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health recovery amount. LV.6: Increases the power of the flash at detonation.</COL>

message.original: 魔矢を放ち、接触した敵を内側から引き裂く触手を 発生させる。触手は他の攻撃対象を感知し、 自ら攻撃に向かう。侵食核の破壊に有効 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃威力の上昇 LV.６で連鎖回数増加</COL>
message.translation: Let loose a dark magickal arrow that tears apart the enemy it contacts with tentacles. The tentacles will seek out additional enemies, and attack them. Effective for destroying Infected Sprouts. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage of skill. LV.6: Increases the target chain amount.</COL>

message.original: 【ＥＸ追加効果】 ダメージ量が増加 魔矢が刺さった敵の体力を継続して奪う
【ＥＸ追加効果】 魔矢が刺さった敵へ攻撃した際の 状態異常値を増加させる
